summary:
Santa at Tyrol 
Last year, my brother and I decided to start our own little Christmas tradition: Julbord (Swedish Christmas buffet) at a place called Tyrol, known for its fantastic atmosphere and great variety of good food. 
We had a wonderful time this year as well. 
We're not particularly fond of the usual Christmas mania with opening presents and so on...
title: Honesty is the Best Gift
